response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking out the garlic clove. The robot now has the garlic clove in its inventory. The next step is to cook the garlic clove.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Take out the butter
(5) Put the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Cook the garlic clove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, stove, camera)
    donothing(env)
    cook(robot, garlic_clove_209)
    donothing(env)
